=== Current Issues ===
Video is crappy using vesa - testing video with hardware testing causes black screen that is non-recoverable from without reboot

Wireless doesn't work

Sound only works through headphones

'''Karmic final:''' Installation via USB-boot media (TRANSCEND 1GB JetFlash TS1GBJFT3) with ubuntu-9.10-alternate-amd64 (textbased) installer no problems. Installation additional to WXP, GRUB2 accepted just (hd0), not /dev/hda;
